awardEventDetails.title: 2018 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (THREE BILLBOARDS OUTSIDE EBBING, MISSOURI is a wicked, winding tale for our times - one that explodes in the complexity of characters who live in a world of equal parts humor and horror. Martin McDonagh's mastery of language fuels the endlessly inventive narrative, and the extraordinary talents of Frances McDormand, Woody Harrelson and Sam Rockwell have audiences ever questioning the invisible line between hope and despair and the modern-day mantra that "anger begets anger.")

awardEventDetails.title: 2018 Winner Spotlight Award
awardEventDetails.description: Sam Rockwell ("Sam Rockwell is one of the most dynamic actors of his generation known for creating memorable and diverse characters. Once again he takes on another challenging role as the immature and explosive Officer Dixon in his critically acclaimed performance in "Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri.")

Martin McDonagh's mastery of language fuels the endlessly inventive narrative, and the extraordinary talents of Frances McDormand, Woody Harrelson and Sam Rockwell have audiences ever questioning the invisible line between hope and despair and the modern-day mantra that "anger begets anger.")
